title: Oceania Games
body: Hello, guys i was just wondering if there were any games such as ProLeague or somethng like that going on in Oceania Australia or just any league of legends challeger game that there are commentators if there are please tell me where to get tickets and where abouts it is thankyou!

replies.body: Im not sure if this is troll, but I will take it as face value. When the OPL (oceania pro league) is on, it is streamed to twitch tv. To watch replays, I go onto youtube type epicskillshot and they will be in his videos
